antimage_mana_break.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
antimage_mana_break.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

antimage_blink.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
antimage_blink.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

antimage_spell_shield.desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
antimage_spell_shield.lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.

antimage_counterspell.desc: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
antimage_counterspell.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

antimage_mana_void.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
antimage_mana_void.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

antimage_mana_overload.desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.
